import docx
doc = docx.Document\(r''c:\\Users\\gabor\\Documents\\git\\cv\\2024_en.docx''\)
for i, para in enumerate\(doc.paragraphs\):
    print\(f''Para {i} text repr: {repr\(para.text\)}''\)
    for run in para.runs:
        print\(f''  Run: {repr\(run.text\)}''\)
